report.title: Overall, Nice
report.author: Josh
report.bodytext: Here is an experience I had with 3g of 15X standardized extract. /n 06/05/08 /n 1:15pm Drank black/oolong/green tea w/ 3g extract partially dissolved, iced. /n T+15 no major noticeable effects /n T+30 slightly lightheaded, perceived pressure in nasal area, dizzy /n T+45 still slightly lightheaded, no more pressure, dizzy /n T+60 more relaxed, no nausea as usually reported as of yet, a little relaxed. /n T+75 definitely relaxed, still lightheaded. sleepy. /n T+90-150 same /n T+150 slight hunger, relaxed, sleepy, no euphoric feeling throughout experience. /n /n Overall, nice. The company I purchased the extract from accidentally gave me an additional 8g, unknowingly, thus making my experience repeatable and quite low-cost. Normally, this would cost nearly $10 but instead cost $3.25, a definite bargain. The herb is a great way to wind down after work as long as I get to sleep before the nausea sets in. The sleepiness could have been a result of my early waking (3:30am). Will try again on weekend w/ higher dosage (6g) to see if it makes difference. Kanna seems to have a much more pleasant, albeit subtler, effect.
